Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Ford
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
Designed for those who dare to explore, the Pioneer is the ultimate all-terrain vehicle. Combining rugged durability with refined comfort, this iconic SUV is built to handle whatever your journey demands. From conquering rugged rimworld trails to cruising abandoned city streets, the Pioneer's powerful V8 engine and advanced four-wheel-drive system ensure unstoppable performance. Inside, the Pioneer offers spacious seating and modern amenities, blending functionality with style for your next great escape. Its bold, timeless design turns heads wherever you go, while its unmatched versatility makes it the perfect companion for work, play, and everything in between.
Experience the thrill of freedom. Experience the Pioneer.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
